allow: Bash(docker-compose exec -T postgres psql -U pacts -d pacts -c "DELETE FROM selector_cache WHERE url LIKE ''%wikipedia%'';")
Bash(docker-compose exec -T postgres psql -U pacts -d pacts -c "\d selector_cache")
Bash(docker-compose exec -T postgres psql -U pacts -d pacts -c "DELETE FROM selector_cache WHERE url_pattern LIKE ''%wikipedia%'';")
Bash(docker-compose run --rm pacts-runner python -m backend.cli.main test --req wikipedia_search)
Bash(docker-compose exec -T postgres psql -U pacts -d pacts -c "SELECT req_id, status, completed_steps, heal_rounds, duration_ms FROM runs ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;")

Bash(docker-compose exec -T postgres psql -U pacts -d pacts -c "SELECT element_name, url_pattern, selector, strategy, hit_count, miss_count FROM selector_cache WHERE element_name LIKE ''%Search%'' ORDER BY created_at DESC;")

Bash(docker-compose exec -T postgres psql -U pacts -d pacts -c "SELECT element_name, url_pattern, strategy, success_count, failure_count, avg_heal_time_ms FROM heal_history ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;")
Bash(docker-compose exec -T postgres psql -U pacts -d pacts -c "SELECT element_name, url_pattern, strategy, success_count, failure_count, avg_heal_time_ms FROM heal_history LIMIT 10;")
Bash(docker-compose exec -T postgres psql -U pacts -d pacts -c "SELECT req_id, status, completed_steps, heal_rounds FROM runs WHERE req_id = ''wikipedia_search'';")
Bash(docker-compose exec -T postgres psql -U pacts -d pacts -c "SELECT artifact_type, COUNT(*) FROM artifacts WHERE req_id = ''wikipedia_search'' GROUP BY artifact_type;")
